name: Taxi Car Simulator 3D - Drive Most Wild & Sports Cab in Town
name_original: Taxi Car Simulator 3D - Drive Most Wild & Sports Cab in Town
description:
Now pick the passengers in elite class sports cars and drop them to their destination in time. Crazy taxi simulator is a sports car taxi driving pick and drop game. In this realistic driving game you need to schedule your time perfectly in order to pick the passengers from multiple spots and drop them to their destinations. This game includes multiple tasks to achieve in limited time. These tasks include fueling the car from power station, picking the passengers from airport & from multiple sites and then drop them to their houses in time.
Drive like a racer in heavy traffic and make the passenger reach its checkpoint in rush. This realistic simulator game is consisting of two mode’s including free drive mode and career mode. Career mode consists of 15 extreme levels with challenging tasks to achieve.
Hope you will enjoy this crazy driving game!!
Features
- 15 extreme levels of crazy taxi duty.
- Multiple driving modes, with free drive mode and career mode.
- Amazing camera view to deliver you realistic sports car experience.
- Smooth and realistic sports car controls.
- Realistic sounds and high quality background music to enhance your gaming experience.
